text: Cop Out is a 2010 action and comedy movie. It is about two police officers who have been working nine years. When they fail to catch a man they think committed a crime, they are suspended without pay. Bruce Willis plays James. Rashida Jones plays Debbie Hodges. The movie received bad reviews from critics. However, it got back $55 million against a $35 million budget. Category:2010s thriller movies Category:2010s comedy movies Category:2010s action movies Category:2010 movies
title: Cop Out (movie)
